name: Head Trip
description: Head Trip is an indica-dominant cross of Chocolate Trip (Katsu cut) and Snow Lotus bred by Bodhi Seeds. It produces relaxing body effects and a somewhat psychedelic cerebral experience that reveals where Head Trip gets its name. The aroma is an earthy mix of chocolate and coffee that offer flavorful relief from anxiety and depression.
descriptionPlain: Head Trip is an indica-dominant cross of Chocolate Trip (Katsu cut) and Snow Lotus bred by Bodhi Seeds. It produces relaxing body effects and a somewhat psychedelic cerebral experience that reveals where Head Trip gets its name. The aroma is an earthy mix of chocolate and coffee that offer flavorful relief from anxiety and depression.

highlightedReviews.text:
I could not smell much after I had taken several whiffs, but Headtrip Golden Shatter was glassy and had some really satisfying snaps to it. I loaded it and had taken my trusty glass straw/honey collector to dab at the sides. The hits were very clean and there was a mild pine taste. Within a few seconds I was experiencing a wobble to my vision, ushering in that psychedelic feel this strain gets it's name from. The sensation was pleasant and I sank into the couch for a bit.
	About forty minutes had passed and the psychedelia was fading more and more until the familiar dull ache returned to my neck, shoulder and hip. Round two of dabbing was a little interesting. I had just finished putting a nice glow on my honey collector and as I was about to dab a small amount. I had accidentally dabbed a much larger dose. The effects were the very same, albeit much more intense. I became a little queasy and dizzy, but that has definitely happened before when I had accidentally dabbed a big piece of High Priority instead of the little one that I was aiming for on the other side of my straw... whoops, got them both! I vomited and learned an important lesson then, as I have now. Too much, too fast could be a real damper on a fun night.  
	The immediate effects of this strain's golden concentrate were in the forms of pain relief and  muscle relaxation. I also noticed a reduction in stress, and anxiety after medicating with this concentrate. The psychedelic effect is fun and provides a great social experience while remaining mellow, relaxed and happy. I would warn the user to be a bit careful and start off slowly as it can be a real heavy hitter, or a headtrip, if you will.
